013package org.apache.juneau.config.event;
014
015/**
016 * Listener that can be used to listen for change events in config maps.
017 */
018public interface ConfigEventListener {
019
020   /**
021    * Gets called immediately after a config file has been loaded.
022    *
023    * @param events The change events.
024    */
025   void onConfigChange(ConfigEvents events);
026}
